projects.title: AIReel Studio
projects.description: A tool to generate short, AI-assisted video reels with auto-captions and smart edits.
projects.longDescription: AIReel Studio is an innovative web application that leverages AI to help content creators produce engaging short-form videos automatically. The platform uses advanced algorithms to analyze video content, generate captions, apply smart edits, and optimize for social media platforms. Built with a modern tech stack, it features real-time processing, intuitive UI, and seamless integration with popular video formats. This project showcases my skills in full-stack development, AI integration, and media processing.
features: AI-powered automatic caption generation
Smart video trimming and editing
Real-time video processing with ffmpeg
Voiceover integration using ElevenLabs API
Optimized export for social media platforms
User-friendly web interface built with Flask

projects.title: Modern Calculator
projects.description: A beautiful, responsive calculator with glass-morphism design and full functionality.
projects.longDescription: This modern calculator features a sleek glass-morphism design with backdrop blur effects, smooth animations, and complete mathematical operations. Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it showcases advanced CSS techniques including CSS Grid, custom properties, and responsive design principles. The calculator includes keyboard support, visual feedback animations, error handling, and optimized touch targets for mobile devices. This project demonstrates proficiency in front-end development, UI/UX design, and modern web standards.

Responsive layout for all screen sizes
Complete mathematical operations (+, -, ร, รท, %)
Keyboard support for desktop users
Visual button press feedback animations
Error handling for division by zero

projects.title: Custom CAPTCHA Generator
projects.description: A secure and interactive CAPTCHA generator with random character generation and real-time verification.
projects.longDescription: This custom CAPTCHA generator creates secure 6-character verification codes using a combination of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, and numbers. The project features a modern UI with a textured background overlay, reload functionality, and instant verification feedback. Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it demonstrates security-focused web development, DOM manipulation, and user experience design. The CAPTCHA system includes visual feedback for correct/incorrect entries, automatic regeneration after successful verification, and responsive design for all devices.
features: Random 6-character CAPTCHA generation (A-Z, a-z, 0-9)
Textured background overlay with noisy pattern
One-click reload/refresh functionality
Real-time input verification with color-coded feedback
Automatic CAPTCHA regeneration after successful verification
Input validation with 6-character limit
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
Clean, centered UI with modern styling
FontAwesome icons integration
Form prevention of default submission behavior

projects.title: TaskMaster Pro - Advanced Todo App
projects.description: A comprehensive, modern todo list application with dark mode, focus timer, and AI-inspired features.
projects.longDescription: TaskMaster Pro is a feature-rich todo list application that combines modern web technologies with intelligent user experience design. Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it features natural language input processing, drag-and-drop task management, focus timer (Pomodoro technique), advanced filtering and search capabilities, and comprehensive statistics tracking. The application includes dark/light mode themes, responsive design for all devices, keyboard shortcuts, task categorization with priority levels, due date management, and local storage persistence. This project demonstrates advanced frontend development skills, complex state management, user experience design, and modern web application architecture following 2025 design trends.
features: AI-inspired natural language task input processing
Dark/light mode toggle with theme persistence
Focus timer (Pomodoro) with customizable durations
Drag and drop task reordering functionality
Advanced filtering by status, priority, category, and date
Real-time search across task titles and descriptions
Task categorization with color-coded priority levels
Due date management with overdue detection
Comprehensive statistics and productivity tracking
Keyboard shortcuts for power users
Responsive design optimized for all screen sizes
Local storage persistence with export/import capabilities
Smooth animations and micro-interactions
Task completion streaks and daily goal tracking
Visual feedback notifications for user actions
